errors.fileTooLarge: Image is too large. Maximum is 10MB.

help.title: How to use the extension:
help.content:
1. Set up your Gemini API key from Google AI Studio
2. Upload your photo (stored locally only)
3. Go to Zalando.cz and you'll see "Try On" buttons on product images
4. Click to start AI generation - wait for the result
5. Results are cached, so same products load faster

Tips:
- Photo should be clear, well-lit
- Preferably plain background without distractions
- Result quality depends on input photo quality

If problems occur:
- Check your API key
- Clear cache
- Refresh the page

privacy.title: Privacy Protection:
privacy.content:
‚úÖ Your photo is stored ONLY in your browser
‚úÖ API key is stored locally, never sent elsewhere
‚úÖ We only communicate with Google Gemini API
‚úÖ We don't collect or store any data on our servers

What's sent to Gemini API:
- Product photo from the website
- Your photo (only for generating result)
- Nothing is permanently stored in the cloud

You can always:
- Clear all stored extension data
- Uninstall extension = everything gets deleted
